languages.text: If the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} is higher than the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against that enemy is increased by +2% for every 5% difference between the character's armour penetration and the enemy's armour.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} персонажа больше, чем {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} противника, то за каждые 5% разницы между ними {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} персонажа по этой цели увеличивается на 2%.

traits.locale_text: If the character's armour penetration is higher than the enemy's armour, the character's critical hit chance against that enemy is increased by +2% for every 5% difference between the character's armour penetration and the enemy's armour.

languages.text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}よりも高い場合、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}がこのキャラクターのアーマー貫通と敵のアーマーの差分5%につき+2%増加する。

languages.text: Ist die {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} des Charakters höher als die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Gegners, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} des Charakters gegen diesen Gegner um +2 % für jeweils 5 % Differenz zwischen der Rüstungsdurchdringung des Charakters und der Rüstung des Gegners.
languages.original_text: If the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} is higher than the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against that enemy is increased by +2% for every 5% difference between the character's armour penetration and the enemy's armour.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} des Charakters höher ist als die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Gegners, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} des Charakters gegen diesen Gegner um +2% pro 5% Differenz zwischen der Rüstungsdurchdringung des Charakters und der Rüstung des Gegners.

languages.text: Si la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} du personnage est supérieure à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi, les chances que le personnage inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à cet ennemi augmentent de +2 % tous les 5 % de différence entre la pénétration d'armure du personnage et l'armure de l'ennemi.

languages.text: Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerinden yüksekse karakterin o düşmana yaptığı saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g}, karakterin zırh delme değeri ile düşmanın zırh değeri arasındaki her %5'lik fark için +%2 artar.
